articles.title: Dodgers star Mookie Betts rents Airbnb 'just in case' rumors of haunted Milwaukee hotel are true - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Milwaukee's haunted hotel has bothered MLB players for years.
articles.content:
One of the beautiful parts of baseball is that it's a billion-dollar industry featuring a number of millionaires who worry about ghosts.

articles.title: Hall of Fame men's basketball coach Denny Crum dies at 86 - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: Denny Crum, the Hall of Fame college basketball coach who led Louisville to two national championships in the 1980s, died Tuesday at 86.
articles.content:
Denny Crum, the Hall of Fame college basketball coach who led Louisville to two national championships in the 1980s, died Tuesday at the age of 86.
